00062 #ifdef DEBUG_XTHREAD

00066 #undef ASSERT
00067 #ifdef NDEBUG
00068 #define ASSERT(expr)
00069 #define C_ASSERT(expr)
00070 #else
00071 #define ASSERT(expr) _my_assert((expr), __FILE__, __LINE__)
00072 #define C_ASSERT(expr) _my_cassert(sizeof(char [ ( expr ) ? 1 : -1 ]))
00073 void my_assert(const char *file, int line);
00074 inline void _my_assert(bool var, const char *file, int line) {
00075     if (!var) my_assert(file, line);
00076 }
00077 inline void _my_cassert(size_t ) {}
00078 #endif

00096 struct XString : public std::string {
00097     XString() : std::string() {}
00098     XString(const char *str) : std::string(str) {}
00099     XString(const QString &str) : std::string(str.toUtf8().data()) {}
00100     XString(const std::string &str) : std::string(str) {}
00101     operator QString() const {return QString::fromUtf8(c_str());}
00102     XString operator+(const char *s) {return *this + XString(s);}
00103 };
00104 
00105 //! Debug printing.
00106 #define dbgPrint(msg) _dbgPrint(msg, __FILE__, __LINE__)
00107 void
00108 _dbgPrint(const XString &str, const char *file, int line);
00109 //! Global Error Message/Printing.
00110 #define gErrPrint(msg) _gErrPrint(msg, __FILE__, __LINE__)
00111 #define gWarnPrint(msg) _gWarnPrint(msg, __FILE__, __LINE__)
00112 void
00113 _gErrPrint(const XString &str, const char *file, int line);
00114 void
00115 _gWarnPrint(const XString &str, const char *file, int line);

00117 //! Base of exception
00118 struct XKameError {
00119     //! errno is read and cleared after a construction
00120     XKameError(const XString &s, const char *file, int line);
00121     void print();
00122     void print(const XString &header);
00123     static void print(const XString &msg, const char *file, int line, int _errno);
00124     const XString &msg() const;
00125 private:
00126     const XString m_msg;
00127     const char *const m_file;
00128     const int m_line;
00129     const int m_errno;
00130 };

00139 double roundlog10(double val);
00140 //! round value within demanded precision.
00141 //! ex. 38.32, 40 to 30, 0.4234, 0.01 to 0.42
00142 double setprec(double val, double prec);
